results.title: Are steroid hormones and autistic traits affected by metformin? First insights from a pilot
results.text_hl: In a stress-induced @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model, @<m>DISEASE_300082</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:300082 @@@social impairment@@@ was restored with treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Gasser B, Escher G, Calin AE, Deppeler M, Marchon M, Kurz J, Mohaupt M. Are steroid hormones and autistic traits affected by metformin? First insights from a pilot Compr Psychoneuroendocrinol. 2023 Nov;16():100196. PMID: 37577184
citations.BibTeX: @article{37577184, title={Are steroid hormones and autistic traits affected by metformin? First insights from a pilot}, author={Gasser B and Escher G and Calin AE and Deppeler M and Marchon M and Kurz J and Mohaupt M}, journal={Compr Psychoneuroendocrinol}, volume={16}, pages={100196}}

results.title: The comparative effectiveness of metformin and risperidone in a rat model of valproic acid-induced autism, Potential role for enhanced autophagy
results.text_hl: Male offspring exposed to @CHEMICAL_Valproic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014635 @@@VPA@@@ during gestation exhibited marked @DISEASE_Anxiety @DISEASE_MESH:D001007 @@@anxiety@@@, @<m>DISEASE_300082</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:300082 @@@social impairment@@@ and aggravation of stereotyped grooming; such deficits were efficiently rescued by postnatal @CHEMICAL_Risperidone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D018967 @@@risperidone@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy.

citations.NLM: Atia AA, Ashour RH, Zaki MM, Rahman KM, Ramadan NM. The comparative effectiveness of metformin and risperidone in a rat model of valproic acid-induced autism, Potential role for enhanced autophagy Psychopharmacology (Berl). 2023 Jun;240(6):1313-1332. PMID: 37133558
citations.BibTeX: @article{37133558, title={The comparative effectiveness of metformin and risperidone in a rat model of valproic acid-induced autism, Potential role for enhanced autophagy}, author={Atia AA and Ashour RH and Zaki MM and Rahman KM and Ramadan NM}, journal={Psychopharmacology (Berl)}, volume={240}, number={6}, pages={1313-1332}}

results.title: Metformin protects against infection-induced myocardial dysfunction.
results.text_hl: KEY RESULTS: @CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@LPS@@@ alone caused @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@cardiac dysfunction@@@, as confirmed by echocardiography, whereas @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ administration, either before or after @CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@LPS@@@, rescued @<m>DISEASE_300082</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:300082 @@@myocardial function@@@.

citations.NLM: Tzanavari T, Varela A, Theocharis S, Ninou E, Kapelouzou A, Cokkinos DV, Kontaridis MI, Karalis KP. Metformin protects against infection-induced myocardial dysfunction. Metabolism. 2016 Oct;65(10):1447-58. PMID: 27621180
